mapper.select: select id, title, content, ( select username from user_tb where id = b.user_id ) as username, created_at from board_tb b where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board_tb ( title, content, user_id, created_at) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.update: update board_tb set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
